RelatedSentence: Information - musical youth channel deals with the most urgent problems of young people in Ukraine , in particular it helps to get oriented towards choosing one 's trade , informs of the most important events in the life of youth , acquaints with modern Ukrainian music .
RUI acquaints foreign listeners with all diversity of political and social - economic life in Ukraine .
As part of the festival it is planned to hold a ceremony of awarding annual International Music Prize named after Eddie Rozner Alfa Jazz Fest Awards - one of the biggest music awards in jazz music .
